// src/redux/actions/productActions.js
import{FETCH_PRODUCTS}from'./actionTypes';export const fetchProducts=()=>{return async dispatch=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://api.example.com/products');const data=await response.json();dispatch({type:FETCH_PRODUCTS,payload:data});}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching products:',error);}};};
